Name: Balance Ball
About the game: In this game you have to pass a lot of tests balancing the ball on the platforms. You will encounter a falling platform, moving, rotating, and static. The game has a system of control points, so that after a failure, you do not start all over again. Beautiful ambient background and pleasant music will not let you get bored. Good luck in passing.
